# Introduction

Welcome to the Data Science and GenAI Workshop!

## Objectives

- Understand foundational theories of data science
- Apply data visualization and machine learning techniques
- Integrate Generative AI into data science workflows
- Explore advanced GenAI systems and future trends

## Audience

This book is designed for students with basic programming knowledge.

## Structure

The workshop is divided into four modules, each with a dedicated chapter and slide deck.
